item.description:
Join me for an Tuesday Evening Bike Ride!

We'll ride till dark or till we are tired which ever comes first. Please be on time for 7:00, call if running late. 508-415-0590. Possible ice cream/frozen yogurt after for those who would like to.

Rain cancels.

Directions to parking River’s Edge Parking Area:

From Route 95 or Route 146
Take the Route 99 North Exit
Take a left at the end of 99 on to Mendon Road
At a fork and set of lights, keep left on Cumberland Hill Rd.
At the next set of lights, take a left onto Hamlet Avenue. After crossing a bridge, take the first left onto Davison Street
Turn left into River’s Edge Recreational parking
There is ample parking at this lot.
item.name: Evening Bike Ride
